casebody.data:
MELTON
v.
SWIFT 2019-0397 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 8, 2019

O'CONNOR, C.J., and KENNEDY, FRENCH, FISCHER, DEWINE, DONNELLY, and STEWART, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

On respondent's motion to dismiss. Motion granted. Relator's emergency motion for stay and expedited alternative writ denied as moot. Cause dismissed.
